title: The Gruffalo Typeface
content:
Does anyone know if it is possible to find the font created for this book, if it's for sale ? Or/And if someone has re-created one inspired by it ?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150127032136im_/http:/typophile.com/files/the-gruffalo-original-story-book_sp10473_1_5193.jpg)
author: Kaedi

comments.content:
This is probably a hand-made illustration - not a font (if you take a look at repeating letters, they are all different).  
You may want to search the Dafont.com "handwritten" category for similar fonts:  
 [http://www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=603](http://web.archive.org/web/20150127032136/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=603 "http://www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=603")

or you may like one of the following similar fonts:  
 **[Scuffle](http://web.archive.org/web/20150127032136/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-7%20%2F%20%28Freemium%29&ffam=Scuffle%20-%20Regular&fid=2a5003dfad50ad3b85f7bcb21e2692cc&fsize=60&text=THE%20GRUFFALO%20Julia%20Donaldson%20Axel%20Schefler&wrap=2)** free font by Rosie Tea [2014]  
 **[Sullivan](http://web.archive.org/web/20150127032136/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Various%20%2F%20MagpiePaperWorks%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Sullivan%20-%20Regular&fid=3d3137dafc8c9e561c6edcdf4f2b3ccd&fsize=60&text=THE%20GRUFFALO%20Julia%20Donaldson%20Axel%20Schefler&wrap=2)** by Magpie Paper Works [2011]

The title and authors names are hand written as all duplicate letters are different.

Sorry, I don't do "inspired by" matches well enough. Maybe someone else can help. (Edit: Perhaps Fivos).

Confirming it is hand-drawn. Adding to the list of substitutes [Velik](http://web.archive.org/web/20150127032136/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/northernblock/velik), [Frosted](http://web.archive.org/web/20150127032136/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/great-lakes-lettering/frosted) and [Icing](http://web.archive.org/web/20150127032136/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/great-lakes-lettering/icing).
